meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a thong.
meanings.sent1: The sandals had a thongy strap that went between the toes.
meanings.sent2: Her thongy swimsuit left tan lines on her back.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his thongy belt was the secret to his fashion success.
meanings.sent4: The narrow, thongy shape of the leaf made it stand out in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The thongy texture of the fabric made it uncomfortable to wear.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a thong.
meanings.sent1: The thongy material of the leash was durable and strong.
meanings.sent2: She preferred thongy sandals for their minimalistic design.
meanings.sent3: The thongy elastic band snapped playfully on his wrist.
meanings.sent4: The thongy nature of the string made it easy to tie knots.
meanings.sent5: The thongy feel of the rubber grip provided a secure hold.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or resembling a thong.
meanings.sent1: The thongy design of the chair made it easy to fold and store.
meanings.sent2: The bag had a thongy closure that kept the contents secure.
meanings.sent3: She found a thongy bookmark in her favorite novel.
meanings.sent4: The thongy outline of the necklace added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The thongy pattern on the rug gave it a unique look.
